string.text: Log entries only for my character
Log entries only for my clan
Log entries only for my kingdom
Texts like '[some army] has been disbanded'
Texts like '[some army] is raiding [some settlement]'
Texts like '[child] was born to [some lord]'
Something with lords insulting each other
Texts like '[some guy] died of old age.' or '[some lord] was executed by [some other lord]'
Texts like '[some character] married [some other character]'
Those texts are related to player's babies
Texts like '[some kingdom] declared war on [some other kingdom]'
Any text regarding end of captivity, like paid ransom or escape
Texts like '[some lord] gathers army at [somewhere]'
Texts like '[faction] [has done something] with e.g.: major support'
Texts like '[some kingdom] made peace with [some other kingdom]'
Texts like '[some hero] has defeated [some other hero]'
Texts like 'Rebels in [Settlement] have taken the ownership of the settlement.'
Texts like '[somebody] has claimed [some settlement} currently held by the [some faction]'
Texts like '[somebody] has been taken prisoner by [someone else]'
Texts like '[somebody] has won the tournament at [some town]'
Texts like '[hero] gained [some] skill points etc..'
Enable or Disable filtering out every log
All the settings will use this if global override is active
Those settings refresh at game start - you can click this to force refresh. Changes do not refresh UI-wise, you need to leave and enter to see them!
Text like '[Hero] has been promoted to tier [Tier]'
Text like '[Hero] is no longer employeed by [Lord]'
This is a list of localization Ids to be seeked out and filtered. Warning, this will filter out ALL instances of given translation! Usage: Type out string to search for separated by `;` symbol.
Text like 'New Smiting Part Unlocked: [Part] for [Weapon]'
Text like 'Your relation increased by [relation] with nearby notables'
Relation changed notifications positive value. If new relation is in positive (0, 100) and lower or equal this value, show notification. Set to -1 to disable all positive relation notifications
Relation changed notifications negative value. If new relation is in negative (-100, -1) and higher or equal this value, show notification. Set to 0 to disable all positive negative notifications'
Notification when relation increases due to high security
Notification when relation increases due to high loyalty
